parameters.title: Channel 4 (W) Brightness
parameters.condition: (dimmer_mode==0 or dimmer_mode==1 or dimmer_mode==2 or dimmer_mode==256)

parameters.title: Channel 4 (W) Brightness
parameters.condition: (dimmer_mode==0 or dimmer_mode==1 or dimmer_mode==2 or dimmer_mode==256)

en.fader_inc_title: Time to Increase Value from 0 to 100% (ms)
en.fader_dec_title: Time to Decrease Value from 0 to 100% (ms)
en.fader_hue_title: Time to Increase/Decrease Hue from 0 to 360
en.inc_h_act_title: Increase hue of RGB strip (circular, HSV-H)
en.dec_h_act_title: Decrease hue of RGB strip (circular, HSV-H)
en.inc_dec_h_act_title: Increase/decrease hue of RGB strip (circular, HSV-H)
en.dimmer_mode_description: Select the operating mode before setting the dimmer
en.lp_repeat_time_title: Parameter Change Rate While Holding Input (ms/unit)
en.lp_hold_time_description: If press is longer than the specified time then it is long
en.lp_repeat_time_description: The smaller value, the faster parameter changes
en.secp_waiting_time_description: If there is no second press during the specified time then press is single. 0 - disables all presses except short and long
en.debounce_time_description: Must be 5-10 times less than second press waiting time. If double presses are disabled - any value
en.pwm_frequency_factor_description: PWM frequency is calculated by formula: 24 kHz / factor
en.channel_min_value_description: Raw PWM Value Corresponding to Minimum Brightness (1%)
en.channel_max_value_description: Raw PWM Value Corresponding to Maximum Brightness (100%)
en.hue_fader_description: Time for changing hue by 360. Please note that the hue is changing by the shortest path (f.e. 10 -> 0 -> 350).
en.baud_rate_description: Make sure that communication with device is established before changing this parameter. Select required baud rate, save configuration and then change port baud rate to the same value.
